Staff

  • Confused Giraffe

    Zoo Keeper

    Back in 2019, when Sunny was still a freshman, he was so confused that he didn’t understand the purpose of the university email’s renaming. So, he had named his email alias as “Confused Giraffe”.

    He was so confused, and he is tall. That’s the origin of the confused giraffe.
